department: Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: request a bid for forklift trucks with ancillary items and Integrated Logistic Support items, one (1) for Group 2A Configuration F and/or one (1) for Group 4B Configuration B, occasional promotional product or business that belong to given manufacturer
description: cancellation of previous bid solicitation and is inviting bidders who wish to participate.
full_summary:
### Retender — Forklift Trucks

---

#### Synopsis

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is soliciting bids for the procurement of one (1) Group 2A Configuration F forklift truck and/or one (1) Group 4B Configuration B forklift truck along with ancillary items and Integrated Logistic Support items, including Familiarization and Troubleshooting trainings.

#### Key Information

*   **Reference Number**: WS4282678757-Doc4544749328
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4282678757
*   **Publication Date**: April 19, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: May 17, 2024, at 14:00:00 (EDT)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 24, 2023
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Traditional
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), etc.

#### Additional Details

*   The bid solicitation supersedes previous bid solicitation number Doc4314133680 dated February 22, 2024, with a closing of March 21, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT.
*   A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who bid on the previous solicitation.
*   Amendment to Closing Time: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on May 17, 2024, by 2:00 PM EDT. All Offers submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

#### Submission Requirements

*   Interested suppliers must be registered with the Government of Canada's Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) web portal.
*   Suppliers must also be prequalified under a Supply Arrangement (SA) that meets the requirements specified in the bid solicitation.

#### Contact Information

*   **Contact Person**: Sherline (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email**: sherline.pieris@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: None

#### Tender Documents

*   The full tender notice, including specifications and terms
